# Ignore folders generated by Unity
[Ll]ibrary/
[Tt]emp/
[Oo]bj/
[Bb]uild/
[Bb]uilds/
[Ll]ibrary/[Pp]ackage[Cc]ache/

# Ignore Visual Studio Code specific files
.vscode/

# Ignore user-specific files
*.suo
*.user
*.userprefs

# Ignore generated files for Android
*.apk
*.aab
*.gradle/
*.idea/
.gradle/

# Ignore build artifacts
Builds/

# Ignore macOS-specific files
.DS_Store

# Unity generated files
[Tt]emp/
[Oo]bj/
[Bb]uild/
[Ll]ibrary/
[Ll]ocal[Cc]ache/
[Uu]ser[Ss]ettings/
[Ll]ibrary/[Pp]ackage[Cc]ache/

# Visual Studio Code
.vscode/

# Rider
.idea/

# User-specific files
*.suo
*.user
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# Unity
*.pidb
*.log
*.log.meta
*_i.c
*_p.c
*_o.c
*_c.c
*_i.h
*.ilk
*.meta
*.pdb
*.pgb
*.pgbo
*.tmp
*.tmp.meta
*.bak
*.bak.meta
*.unityproj
*.unityproj.meta
*.suo
*.user
*.user.meta
*.sln.docstates
*.suo
*.user
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# Rider
.idea/

# User-specific files
*.suo
*.user
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# Mono Auto Generated Files
mono_crash.*

# Windows image file caches
Thumbs.db
ehthumbs.db

# Folder config file
Desktop.ini

# Recycle Bin used on file shares
$RECYCLE.BIN/

# VS Code directories
.vscode/

# Windows Installer files
*.cab
*.msi
*.msm
*.msp

# Windows shortcuts
*.lnk

# JetBrains Rider
.idea/
*.sln.iml
*.iml

# User-specific files
*.suo
*.user
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# Mono Auto Generated Files
mono_crash.*

# Windows image file caches
Thumbs.db
ehthumbs.db

# Folder config file
Desktop.ini

# Recycle Bin used on file shares
$RECYCLE.BIN/

# VS Code directories
.vscode/

# Windows Installer files
*.cab
*.msi
*.msm
*.msp

# Windows shortcuts
*.lnk
